entry.title: https://github.com/InfinityLoop1308/PipePipe
entry.content: A FLOSS Android app to let you browse YouTube, NicoNico and BiliBili freely.

entry.title: https://github.com/MichaelCade/90DaysOfDevOps
entry.content: This repository started out as a learning in public project for myself and has now become a structured learning map for many in the community. We have 3 years under our belt covering all things DevOps, including Principles, Processes, Tooling and Use Cases surrounding this vast topic.

entry.title: https://github.com/SeleniumHQ/docker-selenium
entry.content: Provides a simple way to run Selenium Grid with Chrome, Firefox, and Edge using Container Platform, making it easier to perform browser automation at scale

entry.title: https://github.com/aquasecurity/trivy-action
entry.content: Runs Trivy as GitHub action to scan your Docker container image for vulnerabilities

entry.title: https://github.com/armbian/build
entry.content: Armbian Linux build framework generates custom Debian or Ubuntu image for x86, aarch64, riscv64 & armhf

entry.title: https://github.com/docker-mailserver/docker-mailserver
entry.content: Production-ready fullstack but simple mail server (SMTP, IMAP, LDAP, Antispam, Antivirus, etc.) running inside a container.

entry.content: Helm chart to install Vault and other associated components.

entry.title: https://github.com/n8n-io/n8n-hosting
entry.content: Example of self-hosting n8n in various environments like docker, kubernetes, etc.

entry.title: https://github.com/nvm-sh/nvm
entry.content: Node Version Manager - POSIX-compliant bash script to manage multiple active node.js versions

entry.title: https://github.com/ohmyzsh/ohmyzsh
entry.content: 🙃 A delightful community-driven (with 2,400+ contributors) framework for managing your zsh configuration. Includes 300+ optional plugins (rails, git, macOS, hub, docker, homebrew, node, php, python, etc), 140+ themes to spice up your morning, and an auto-update tool that makes it easy to keep up with the latest updates from the community.

entry.title: https://github.com/youngyangyang04/leetcode-master
entry.content: 《代码随想录》LeetCode 刷题攻略：200道经典题目刷题顺序，共60w字的详细图解，视频难点剖析，50余张思维导图，支持C++，Java，Python，Go，JavaScript等多语言版本，从此算法学习不再迷茫！🔥🔥 来看看，你会发现相见恨晚！🚀
